Welcome to mchess’s documentation!¶

class chess_link.ChessLink(appque, name)[source]¶

This implements the ‘Chess Link’ protocol for Millennium Chess Genius Exclusive and future boards compatible with that protocol

check_move(pos)[source]¶

Check, if current change on board is a legal move. If yes, put move into queue

move_from(fen, legal_moves, color, eval_only=False)[source]¶

Register all legal moves possible in current position

new_game(pos)[source]¶

Initiate a new game

position_initialized()[source]¶

Check, if a board position has been received and chess link board is online. Returns True on success

set_mv_led(pos, freq)[source]¶

Set the leds on board according to pos array

show_deltas(positions, freq)[source]¶

Signal leds to show difference between current position on board, and intended position. This is used to signal moves by other agents, or discrepancies with the current position.

write_configuration()[source]¶

Write the configuration for hardware connection (USB/Bluetooth LE) and board orientation

Helper functions for the Chess Link protocol for character-based odd-parity and message-block-parity.

The chess link protocol sends ASCII messages. Each ASCII character gets an additional odd-parity-bit. Each block of ASCII+odd-parity bytes gets an additional block parity.
